gsft.model

Class Disk

  • java.lang.Object
    • gsft.model.Disk

  • public class Disk
extends Object
    Class that represents each disk of a Virtual Machine.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Disk(String uuid, String format)
      Constructs a Disk object.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Disk

        public Disk(String uuid,
            String format)
        Constructs a Disk object.
        Parameters:
        uuid - Unique id of the disk.
        format - File Format of the disk

    • Method Detail

      • getBaseName

        public String getBaseName()
        Retrieves the base name of the disk file
        Returns:
        name of the file used for the disk (without directories)

      • getUuid

        public String getUuid()
        Retrieves the Unique id for the disk
        Returns:
        Unique id of the disk

      • setUuid

        public void setUuid(String uuid)
        Sets the value of the Unique id for the disk
        Parameters:
        uuid - Unique id of the disk

      • getFormat

        public String getFormat()
        Retrieves the file format used to store the disk. Virtualbox typically uses the "VDI" format
        Returns:
        file format used to store the disk

      • setFormat

        public void setFormat(String format)
        Sets the file format used to store the disk
        Parameters:
        format - file format used to store the disk

      • getBaseImage

        public Image getBaseImage()
        Retrieves the base image of the disk. Typically, the base image is the file used to create the virtual machine. In VirtualBox, all the snapshots stores incremental changes over the base image.
        Returns:
        base image of the disk

      • setBaseImage

        public void setBaseImage(Image baseImage)
        Sets the base image for the disk
        Parameters:
        baseImage - base image of the disk

      • addImages

        public void addImages(Image image)
        Add an image to the disk. This method is used to track all the image files (e.g. those used in snapshots) related to each disk.
        Parameters:
        image - image file to add to the disk

      • getImage

        public Image getImage(String uuid)
        Retrieves the image associated to a disk by its UUID.
        Parameters:
        uuid - unique id of the image to retrieve
        Returns:
        image associated to the disk with that UUID. Returns null if the disk is not found.

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
